languages.text: "Я прибыл сюда с отрядом сопровождения, который был потерян в первом же открытом столкновении — монастырь буквально кишит еретиками. Люди, которых я реквизировал у губернатора, или пали в бою, или истекли кровью, или сбежали. Мне пришлось ограничиться отловом и пристрастными расспросами отдельных бунтовщиков. От них я и узнал то, что только что передал вам".

"I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."
languages.original_text: "Я прибыл сюда с отрядом сопровождения, который был потерян в первом же открытом столкновении — монастырь буквально кишит еретиками. Люди, которых я реквизировал у губернатора, или пали в бою, или истекли кровью, или сбежали. Мне пришлось ограничиться отловом и пристрастными расспросами отдельных бунтовщиков. От них я и узнал то, что только что передал вам".

traits.locale_text: "I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is veritably swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor either fell in battle or bled to death or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I've relayed to you now."

"I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is veritably swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor either fell in battle or bled to death or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I've relayed to you now."

"I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is veritably swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."

"I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is veritably swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."

"I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."

languages.text: “我率领着一支护卫队来到此地，可他们在第一次公开遭遇战中就全体阵亡了。这座修道院里到处都是异端分子。我从总督那里征用来的士兵，要么横尸此地，要么逃之夭夭。我不得不逮捕、审讯某些叛乱分子，勉强解决当下的问题。我刚刚告诉你的那些话，都是从那些人的口中得知的。”
languages.original_text: "I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."

traits.locale_text: “我率领着一支护卫队来到此地，可他们在第一此公开遭遇战中就全体阵亡了。这座修道院里确实有很多异端分子。我从总督那里征用来的士兵，要么血染沙场，要么逃之夭夭。我不得不通过逮捕、审讯个别叛乱分子来勉强解决问题。我刚刚告诉你的那些话，都是从那些人的口中知道的。”

languages.text: 「私は護衛部隊を率いてここに到着したが、最初の小競り合いでその部隊を失ってしまったのだ。修道院には異端者が大量に潜んでいた。私が総督から徴発した兵士たちは、戦死したり、出血多量で死んだり、脱走したりしてしまった。私は、反乱軍を一人一人捕まえては、強引に尋問していくしかなかったのだ。そうして、私がたった今あなたに伝えた情報を彼らより聞いたのだ」
languages.original_text: "I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."

traits.locale_text: 「私は護衛部隊を率いてここに到着したが、最初の小競り合いでその部隊を失ってしまったのだ。修道院には異端者が大量に潜んでいた。私が総督から徴発した兵士たちは、戦死したり、出血多量で死んだり、脱走したりしてしまった。私は、反乱軍を一人一人捕まえては、強引に尋問していくしかなかったのだ。そうして、私がたった今あなたに伝えた情報を彼らより聞いたのだ」

languages.text: "Ich traf dort mit einem Trupp als Eskorte ein, nur um ihn gleich beim ersten offenen Gefecht zu verlieren. In dem Kloster wimmelt es von Ketzern. Die Soldaten, die ich vom Gouverneur angefordert hatte, fielen in der Schlacht, verbluteten oder desertierten. Ich muss also eigenhändig einzelne Rebellen fangen und mit Nachdruck verhören. Von ihnen habe ich erfahren, was ich Euch gerade mitgeteilt habe."
languages.original_text: "I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich traf dort mit einem Trupp als Eskorte ein, nur um ihn gleich beim ersten offenen Gefecht zu verlieren. In dem Kloster wimmelt es buchstäblich von Ketzern. Die Soldaten, die ich vom Gouverneur angefordert hatte, fielen in der Schlacht, verbluteten oder desertierten. Ich muss also eigenhändig einzelne Rebellen fangen und mit Nachdruck verhören. Von ihnen habe ich erfahren, was ich Euch gerade mitgeteilt habe."

languages.text: « Je suis arrivé ici avec une escorte armée, mais elle a été décimée lors de notre toute première escarmouche. Le monastère grouille d'hérétiques. Les soldats que j'avais réquisitionnés auprès du gouverneur sont morts au combat ou se sont vidés de leur sang, quand ils n'ont pas déserté. J'ai dû me contenter d'attraper et d'interroger des rebelles isolés. Ce sont eux qui m'ont donné les informations que je viens de vous transmettre. »
languages.original_text: "I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis arrivé ici avec une escorte armée, mais elle a été décimée lors de notre toute première escarmouche. Le monastère grouille d'hérétiques. Les soldats que j'avais réquisitionnés auprès du gouverneur sont morts au combat ou se sont vidés de leur sang, quand ils n'ont pas déserté. J'ai dû me contenter d'attraper et d'interroger des rebelles isolés. Ce sont eux qui m'ont donné les informations que je viens de vous transmettre. »

languages.text: «Llegué aquí con un escuadrón de escolta que perdí en nuestra primera escaramuza; el monasterio está atestado de herejes. Los soldados que solicité al gobernador cayeron en combate, se desangraron por las heridas o desertaron. He tenido que limitarme a atrapar e interrogar por la fuerza a rebeldes solitarios. Así es como he descubierto todo lo que le he contado».
languages.original_text: "I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."

traits.locale_text: «Llegué aquí con un escuadrón de escolta que perdí en nuestra primera escaramuza; el monasterio está atestado de herejes. Los soldados que solicité al gobernador cayeron en combate, se desangraron por las heridas o desertaron. He tenido que limitarme a atrapar e interrogar por la fuerza a rebeldes solitarios. Así es como he descubierto todo lo que le he contado».

languages.original_text: "I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."

languages.text: "Buraya bir refakatçi ekibiyle geldim lakin kendilerini ilk çatışmada kaybettim. Manastır kâfirlerle dolup taşıyor. Validen talep ettiğim askerler ya çatışmada öldü, ya kan kaybından gitti ya da firar etti. İsyancıları tek tek yakalayıp zorla sorgulamaya mecbur kaldım. Az önce aktardıklarımı da onlardan öğrendim."
languages.original_text: "I arrived here with an escort squad, only to lose it in our very first open skirmish; the monastery is swarming with heretics. The soldiers I requisitioned from the governor fell in battle, bled to death, or deserted. I had to make do with catching and forcefully interrogating individual rebels. It is from them that I learned what I relayed to you just now."

traits.locale_text: "Buraya bir refakatçi ekibiyle geldim lakin kendilerini ilk çatışmada kaybettim. Manastır kâfirlerle dolup taşıyor. Validen talep ettiğim askerler ya çatışmada öldü, ya kan kaybından gitti ya da firar etti. İsyancıları tek tek yakalayıp zorla sorgulamaya mecbur kaldım.
